code_analysis: Analyze this Python code and identify any potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, or performance issues.
Debug this JavaScript function that returns incorrect results.
Review this code for style and readability improvements.
Optimize this SQL query for better performance.
Refactor this function to make it more maintainable.
Identify security vulnerabilities in this authentication code.
Check this API endpoint for potential race conditions.
Analyze the time complexity of this algorithm.
Find memory leaks in this React component.
Review this database schema for normalization issues.
Check this error handling code for edge cases.
Analyze this caching strategy for correctness.
Identify bottlenecks in this data processing pipeline.
Review this test suite for coverage gaps.
data_analysis: Analyze this sales data CSV and identify trends, outliers, and actionable insights.
Extract all dates, monetary amounts, and customer names from this financial report.
Summarize the key findings from this market research data.
Compare quarterly revenue across different regions.
Identify patterns in customer churn data.
Analyze website traffic logs and extract peak usage times.
Calculate conversion rates from this e-commerce data.
Find correlations between marketing spend and sales.
Detect anomalies in this time-series sensor data.
Aggregate user behavior metrics by demographic.
content_generation: Generate a professional email declining a job offer while expressing gratitude.
Write a brief product description for an eco-friendly water bottle.
Create a compelling LinkedIn post about remote work trends.
Draft a press release announcing a new product launch.
Write an engaging introduction for a technical blog post.
Generate social media captions for a marketing campaign.
Create a follow-up email template for sales prospects.
Write a concise executive summary for this business plan.
Draft a professional out-of-office email message.
Generate interview questions for a senior developer position.
explanation: Explain quantum computing to a 10-year-old using simple analogies and examples.
Describe how DNS works in technical detail.
Explain the difference between TCP and UDP protocols.
Teach me the basics of machine learning in simple terms.
Break down how OAuth 2.0 authentication works.
Explain the concept of async/await in JavaScript.
comparison: Compare React and Vue.js frameworks and highlight their strengths and weaknesses.
Analyze the differences between SQL and NoSQL databases.
Compare AWS, Azure, and GCP for hosting a web application.
Compare different caching strategies for high-traffic systems.
Analyze the trade-offs between consistency and availability in distributed systems.
Compare functional and object-oriented programming paradigms.
